title: URF Mode gone early?
body: Hi um just wanted someone to clarify why URF Mode is gone on OCE. I thought it finishes close to the end of Sunday but its only 12pm?

replies.body:
its currently 10am EST.

The Rotating Modes do not become available until 11am EST.

It finishes tonight (tomorrow) at 3am EST.
Just keep URF on. That is the only one everyone wants to play. You find less toxic players and it is more fun to play. !Attention Riot! Just keep it on 24/7
nah... supposed to be fun but quickly turns into play the op champs tryhard fest.

NO just leave it on. 

Reasons: 
Less abusive/toxic people
Faster queue times
Faster games
Less chat in game and more gameplay
More people like that than the standard Summoners Rift

Riot will see all this in their reports so they just need to keep it on 24/7 and we will have a better community
